dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper describes the process and outcome of the efforts to develop a new standard for Personal Health Data PHD based on the existing 11 073 family of standards for medical devices It identifies the requirements for a standard that is to be applied to small devices with limited resources of processor memory and power and that will use short range wireless technology It describes how existing components of 11 073 such the Domain Information Model and nomenclature have been used and adapted to create the new standard
Studies in health technology and informatics
Developing a standard for personal health devices based on 11,073.
